name: Animation RPG Demo
description:
Turn based RPG prototype made by a student for his 3D Animation college subject and for fun!

You are a space warrior and you have to defeat an evil (and kinda cute) robot ball in a turn-based all school RPG battle.

Credits:
  • Programming, 3D art, Animation and Game design: Roberto Abad Jiménez
  • Music and SFX: Sebastián Fernández Garro de Oro
